General.Name: Omni-Lite Industries Canada Inc
General.Description: Omni-Lite Industries Canada Inc. operates as a designer and manufacturer of precision components in the United States and Canada. It offers forged, electronic, and investment casting components for aerospace, military, specialty, automotive, sports, and recreational industries. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Cerritos, California.
General.Address: 17210 Edwards Road, Cerritos, CA, United States, 90703

4.Name: Mr. Mikel  Damke
